# SPG clustering for Human

```{r}
###. Raw counts data for three species
load("~/storage/HumanMacaqueMouseCompAnaysis/countsOriginalData/human_merged1235_20cpg15upg.robj")
dge.hum.raw <- dge@raw.data
rm(dge)
```

###. Full dataset
```{r}
dge.hum.spg.full.raw <- dge.hum.raw[,spg.cca@cell.names[spg.cca@meta.data$species=="Human"]]
saveRDS(dge.hum.spg.full.raw, file="~/storage/HumanMacaqueMouseCompAnaysis/interdata/dge.hum.spg.full.raw.rds")
```

###. Only keep cluster 1-6 in merged SPG analysis
```{r}
dge.hum.spg.full.raw <- dge.hum.spg.full.raw[,spg.cca@cell.names[spg.cca@meta.data$species=="Human" & spg.cca@meta.data$res.0.6.ord %in% c(1:6)]]
```

```{r}
dge.hum.spg.full <- CreateSeuratObject(raw.data = dge.hum.spg.full.raw)
dge.hum.spg.full <- NormalizeData(object = dge.hum.spg.full, normalization.method = "LogNormalize", 
    scale.factor = 10000)
```

```{r}
dge.hum.spg.full <- FindVariableGenes(object = dge.hum.spg.full,mean.function = ExpMean, dispersion.function = LogVMR, x.low.cutoff = 0.0125, y.cutoff = 1, x.high.cutoff = 3)
batchs <- as.vector(sapply(colnames(dge.hum.spg.full.raw),function(x) strsplit(x,'_')[[1]][1]))
batchs[batchs %in% c("Human1", "Human2", "Human3", "Human4", "Human5")] = "Human1"
batchs[batchs %in% c("Human6", "Human7")] = "Human2"
batchs[batchs %in% c("Human8", "Human9")] = "Human3"
batchs[batchs %in% c("Human11")] = "Human5"
dge.hum.spg.full@meta.data$indi = batchs
dge.hum.spg.full <- ScaleData(object = dge.hum.spg.full,vars.to.regress = c("nUMI"))
dge.hum.spg.full <- RunPCA(object = dge.hum.spg.full, pc.genes = dge.hum.spg.full@var.genes)
dge.hum.spg.full <- RunTSNE(object = dge.hum.spg.full, dims.use = 1:15)
dge.hum.spg.full <- RunUMAP(object = dge.hum.spg.full, dims.use = 1:15)
```

```{r}
table(dge.hum.spg.full@meta.data$indi)
table(dge.hum.spg.full@meta.data$orig.ident)
```


```{r fig.width=6,fig.height=4.5}
PCAPlot(object = dge.hum.spg.full, dim.1 = 1, dim.2 = 2)
PCAPlot(object = dge.hum.spg.full, dim.1 = 1, dim.2 = 2, group.by="indi")
PCAPlot(object = dge.hum.spg.full, dim.1 = 1, dim.2 = 3)
PCAPlot(object = dge.hum.spg.full, dim.1 = 1, dim.2 = 3, group.by="indi")
PCElbowPlot(object = dge.hum.spg.full)
```

```{r fig.width=6,fig.height=4.5}
TSNEPlot(object = dge.hum.spg.full, group.by="indi")
TSNEPlot(object = dge.hum.spg.full)
DimPlot(object = dge.hum.spg.full, reduction.use = "umap", do.return = TRUE)
DimPlot(object = dge.hum.spg.full, reduction.use = "umap", do.return = TRUE, group.by="indi")
```

## CCA
```{r}
batchs <- as.vector(sapply(colnames(dge.hum.spg.full.raw),function(x) strsplit(x,'_')[[1]][1]))
dge.hum.spg.1 <- CreateSeuratObject(raw.data = dge.hum.spg.full.raw[,batchs %in% c("Human1", "Human2", "Human3", "Human4", "Human5")])
dge.hum.spg.1 <- NormalizeData(object = dge.hum.spg.1)
dge.hum.spg.1 <- ScaleData(object = dge.hum.spg.1)
dge.hum.spg.1 <- FindVariableGenes(object = dge.hum.spg.1, do.plot = FALSE)

dge.hum.spg.2 <- CreateSeuratObject(raw.data = dge.hum.spg.full.raw[,batchs %in% c("Human6", "Human7")])
dge.hum.spg.2 <- NormalizeData(object = dge.hum.spg.2)
dge.hum.spg.2 <- ScaleData(object = dge.hum.spg.2)
dge.hum.spg.2 <- FindVariableGenes(object = dge.hum.spg.2, do.plot = FALSE)

dge.hum.spg.3 <- CreateSeuratObject(raw.data = dge.hum.spg.full.raw[,batchs %in% c("Human8", "Human9")])
dge.hum.spg.3 <- NormalizeData(object = dge.hum.spg.3)
dge.hum.spg.3 <- ScaleData(object = dge.hum.spg.3)
dge.hum.spg.3 <- FindVariableGenes(object = dge.hum.spg.3, do.plot = FALSE)
```

```{r}
hvg.hum.spg.1 <- rownames(x = head(x = dge.hum.spg.1@hvg.info, n = 1000))
hvg.hum.spg.2 <- rownames(x = head(x = dge.hum.spg.2@hvg.info, n = 1000))
hvg.hum.spg.3 <- rownames(x = head(x = dge.hum.spg.3@hvg.info, n = 1000))
hvg.union <- union(x = hvg.hum.spg.1, y = hvg.hum.spg.2)
hvg.union <- union(x = hvg.union, y = hvg.hum.spg.3)
```

```{r}
dge.hum.spg.1@meta.data[,"indi"] <- "Human1"
dge.hum.spg.2@meta.data[,"indi"] <- "Human2"
dge.hum.spg.3@meta.data[,"indi"] <- "Human3"
```

```{r}
hum.spg.cca <- RunMultiCCA(object.list = list(dge.hum.spg.1, dge.hum.spg.2, dge.hum.spg.3),genes.use = hvg.union, num.ccs = 20)
```

```{r}
MetageneBicorPlot(hum.spg.cca, grouping.var = "indi", dims.eval = 1:20, display.progress = TRUE)
```


```{r}
hum.spg.cca <- AlignSubspace(object = hum.spg.cca, reduction.type = "cca", grouping.var = "indi", dims.align = 1:15)
hum.spg.cca <- RunTSNE(object = hum.spg.cca, reduction.use = "cca.aligned", dims.use = 1:15)
hum.spg.cca <- RunUMAP(object = hum.spg.cca, reduction.use = "cca.aligned", dims.use = 1:15)
```


```{r fig.width=6, fig.height=4.5}
TSNEPlot(object = hum.spg.cca, do.return = TRUE, pt.size = 1, group.by = "indi")
DimPlot(object = hum.spg.cca, reduction.use = "umap", do.return = TRUE, group.by="indi")
DimPlot(object = hum.spg.cca, reduction.use = "cca.aligned", do.return = TRUE, group.by="indi")
```

hum.spg.cca <- FindClusters(object = hum.spg.cca, reduction.type = "cca.aligned", dims.use = 1:15, save.SNN = TRUE, resolution = 0.6)
hum.spg.cca <- FindClusters(object = hum.spg.cca, reduction.type = "cca.aligned", dims.use = 1:15, save.SNN = TRUE, resolution = 0.7)

###. Corss with Merged SPG 6 clusters
####. 1. res = 0.5
```{r fig.width=6, fig.height=4.5}
hum.spg.cca@meta.data$res.0.5.ord <- plyr::mapvalues(hum.spg.cca@meta.data$res.0.5, c(1,0,2,3),c(1,2,3,4))
TSNEPlot(object = hum.spg.cca, do.return = TRUE, pt.size = 1, group.by = "res.0.5.ord")
DimPlot(object = hum.spg.cca, reduction.use = "umap", do.return = TRUE, group.by="res.0.5.ord")
table(hum.spg.cca@meta.data$res.0.5.ord, spg.cca@meta.data[hum.spg.cca@cell.names,]$res.0.6.ord)
```
Cluster centroid for SPG
```{r}
hum.spg.cen.0.5 <- c()
clus <- unique(hum.spg.cca@meta.data$res.0.5.ord)
for(i in clus){
  cen <- apply(hum.spg.cca@data[,hum.spg.cca@meta.data$res.0.5.ord == i], 1, mean)
  hum.spg.cen.0.5 <- cbind(hum.spg.cen.0.5, cen)
}
colnames(hum.spg.cen.0.5) <- clus
```

```{r fig.width=4.9,fig.height=4.5}
hum.spg.cor.0.5 <- cor(hum.spg.cen.0.5, method="spearman")
a = seriate(hum.spg.cor.0.5,method="BEA_TSP")
ord = get_order(a)
Heatmap(hum.spg.cor.0.5[ord,ord], cluster_rows = FALSE, cluster_columns = FALSE)
```

hum.spg.cca@meta.data$res.0.6.ord <- plyr::mapvalues(hum.spg.cca@meta.data$res.0.6, c(1,0,4,2,3),c(1,2,3,4,5))
